name: Move Digital
slogan: No-nonsense SEO Digital Marketing Agency for ambitious SMEs

team.name: Will Bradley
team.bioHtml: Worked at @Move Digital

jobs.title: Paid Media Specialist / PPC Account Manager
jobs.description:
PPC Account Manager

If you want to work in agile agency where you will have a big impact on campaigns then this could be the role for you.

Whilst Google Ad-words / skills are a huge part of the role you will also be a pro in running FB, Instagram, Snapchat and LinkedIn campaigns!

About Us

Move Digital launched in 2012. We are based in Vauxhall. We are exploring new areas of Search such as Voice and anyone interested in this role should visit the owners Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/geraintjohn/ to get a feel for the agency.

Our areas of focus are SEO & PPC, Podcasting & Voice (Google, Bing, Facebook, Instagram LinkedIn, Snapchat) and our clients range from Forklifts to Coca Cola.

The Role

Set up & Management of all paid campaigns
Ensure all accounts are tracked effectively and data is reported back
Main point of contact for all Paid clients
Getting content briefs signed off with clients
Ensuring that all client accounts are on target and delivering KPI’s agreed
Devising long term and short term paid strategies
Innovation within Move! We want you to help us grow and want your ideas
Performance reporting for all Paid clients

Skills and Experience
Minimum of 2 years agency experience
Demonstrable results from Google and Paid Social campaigns
Advanced keyword research skills
Google Adwords qualified
Excellent analytical experience (Google Analytics / Google Tag Manager / Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn analytics)
Excellent numeracy skills and highly analytical
Experience of A/B Split testing
Experience of building splash pages

About you
You have an entrepreneurial spirit and understand the importance of your role. Our clients use us because they want more traction online. You live and breath results. You are transparent, honest and highly ambitious.

You have a proven track record and have worked in a similar role for at least 2 years (preferably agency)
